tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Nose
tastingNotes.description: Rich peat smoke with hints of citrus and sea salt.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Palate
tastingNotes.description: Bold and spicy with a touch of vanilla and oak.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Finish
tastingNotes.description: Long and warming with a smoky aftertaste.

history.label: First Release
history.title: The Beginning of the Talisker 18 Year Old
history.description: The first batch of Talisker 18 was released in 2022.

history.label: Award Winning
history.title: Gold Medal at International Spirits Challenge
history.description: Talisker 18 won a gold medal in 2022.

history.label: Limited Edition
history.title: Special Edition Release
history.description: A limited edition release with unique packaging.

history.label: Distillery Tour
history.title: Public Opening of Talisker Distillery
history.description: The distillery opened its doors to the public in 2023.

history.label: Collaboration
history.title: Talisker x Ocean Conservation
history.description: A special release to support ocean conservation efforts.

history.label: Anniversary
history.title: 200th Anniversary Celebration
history.description: Celebrating 200 years of Talisker distillery.

history.label: Cask Strength
history.title: Cask Strength Release
history.description: A limited cask strength edition released in 2023.

history.label: Festival
history.title: Featured at Whisky Festival
history.description: Talisker 18 was featured at the 2023 Whisky Festival.

history.label: Charity
history.title: Charity Auction
history.description: A rare bottle was auctioned for charity in 2023.

history.label: Export
history.title: Expansion to New Markets
history.description: Talisker 18 expanded to Asian markets in 2023.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Nose
tastingNotes.description: Sweet and fruity with notes of pear and apple.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Palate
tastingNotes.description: Smooth and rich with hints of oak and vanilla.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Finish
tastingNotes.description: Long and satisfying with a touch of spice.

history.label: Special Release
history.title: Glenfiddich 21st Anniversary
history.description: A limited edition release for the 21st anniversary.

history.label: Award
history.title: Best Single Malt at World Whisky Awards
history.description: Glenfiddich 21 won the best single malt award in 2022.

history.label: Collaboration
history.title: Glenfiddich x Fashion Brand
history.description: A collaboration with a luxury fashion brand in 2023.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Nose
tastingNotes.description: Rich and sweet with notes of dried fruit and oak.

tastingNotes.author: Charles MacLean MBE
tastingNotes.title: Palate
tastingNotes.description: Smooth and balanced with hints of vanilla and spice.

tastingNotes.title: Finish

history.label: First Batch
history.title: Initial Macallan 12 Year Old Release
